titleInfo.title: Roy Acuff Grand Ole Opry Discs: Tape 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: The recording is of Roy Acuff's American Ace Coffee sponsored Grand Ole Opry. The tape is labeled Acuff's tape number two of an unidentified number. The tape features multiple recordings. The recording features Grant Turner (host) and features performances by: Tommy Jackson (musician), Rod Brasfield (comedian), Roy Acuff (musician/host), Smokey Mountain Boys (musical group), Ernest Tubb (musician), Oswald and Joe (musicial duo), Pap and his Jug Band (musical group), Texas Ruby (musician), and Brothers Oswald (musicial duo). The tape is from a multitude of dates from: November 15, 1947; and November 22, 1947.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
